about_the_game:
This bundle includes a collection of recipes for weapon parts, items from past titles of the "Atelier" series, and some new Catalysts and Enhancing Agents that will become available for purchase from shops in the game.

A total of 30 new recipes can be learned, including the following:
- Blason of Genesis
(Recipe overview)
Allows you to synthesize "Blason of Genesis", which can be used for weapon customization.

- Parasim of Courage
(Recipe overview)
Allows you to synthesize "Parasim of Courage", which can be used for weapon customization.

- Phoenix Bracelet
(Recipe overview)
Allows you to synthesize the accessory "Phoenix Bracelet".

- Mushroom Stew
(Recipe overview)
Allows you to synthesize the item "Mushroom Stew", which allows you to recover HP when used during battle.

- Omega Craft
(Recipe overview)
Allows you to synthesize the item "Omega Craft", which deals physical damage when used during battle.

and other.

The new items that will become available for purchase include:
- Blue Sky Tear
(Item overview)
An Enhancing Agent. By injecting the agent during synthesis, you can fill in the open spaces on the panel.

- Cannon Fruit
(Item overview)
A Catalyst. By using it during synthesis, you can change the number of spaces on the panel.

- Wind Rider Feather
(Item overview)
An Enhancing Agent. By injecting the agent during synthesis, star bonus marks will be changed to different bonus marks.

- Nectar Springwater
(Item overview)
A Catalyst. By using it during synthesis, you can change the number of spaces on the panel.

*This content is also included in the "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."
